mapper.select: SELECT s.shop_id, s.shop_name, COUNT(re.review_id) AS review_count, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(re.review_rate), 2), 0) AS avg_rate, s.shop_location FROM shop s LEFT JOIN receipt r ON r.receipt_shop_id = s.shop_id LEFT JOIN review re ON r.receipt_id = re.review_receipt_id WHERE s.shop_category = #{shopCategory} AND s.shop_status = 1 GROUP BY s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_location;

SELECT s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_business_time, s.shop_member_id, s.shop_tel, COUNT(re.review_id) AS review_count, ROUND(AVG(re.review_rate), 2) AS avg_rate, s.shop_location, MAX(re.review_date) AS latest_review_date, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(re.review_rate), 2), 0) AS avg_rate, s.review_summary, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(re.review_content ORDER BY re.review_date DESC), ',', 1) AS latest_review_content, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(m.member_nickname ORDER BY re.review_date DESC), ',', 1) AS latest_member_nickname FROM shop s LEFT JOIN receipt r ON r.receipt_shop_id = s.shop_id LEFT JOIN review re ON r.receipt_id = re.review_receipt_id LEFT JOIN member m ON re.review_member_id = m.member_id WHERE s.shop_id = #{shopId} AND s.shop_status = 1 AND re.review_status = 0 GROUP BY s.shop_id, s.shop_name, s.shop_business_time, s.shop_member_id, s.shop_location,review_summary;
SELECT shop_name, shop_location, shop_category, shop_business_time, shop_tel, shop_introduction, shop_closed_day from shop where shop_id = #{shopId} AND shop_status = 1
SELECT shop_name, shop_latitude, shop_longitude, shop_category,shop_id FROM shop WHERE shop_status = 1
